Title: The Orphanage
Overview: A woman brings her family back to her childhood home, which used to be an orphanage, intent on reopening it. Before long, her son starts to communicate with a new invisible friend.
Tagline: A tale of love. A story of horror.
production_companies: Wild Bunch, Telecinco, Telecinco Cinema, Televisió de Catalunya TV3, Esta Vivo! Laboratorio de Nuevos Talentos, Grupo Rodar, Rodar y Rodar Cine y Televisión, Warner Bros. Pictures de España
Cast: Belén Rueda, Fernando Cayo, Roger Príncep
